item.title: Report X-2023120797
item.description:
Report X-2023120797

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: RENO
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The shipment was dropped off over the counter. It was later discovered that it was emitting a strong odor. The outer box contained 2 fiberboard boxes. One box contained one metal can. The second box contained 2 metal cans. All 3 metal cans were wrapped in paper, emitting an odor and was cold to the touch. All 3 metal bottles are labelled UN 3334, Class 9, PG III (2-(4-methylthiazol-5-yl)ethyl acetate), Lot#275, PO# EUN-3205RI05. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2023121136
item.description:
Report X-2023121136

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-05T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SORT AISLE SUPERVISOR INFORMED THERE WAS A LEAKER IN DOOR 3. RESPONDER GRABBED SPILL CART AND WENT TO DOOR 3 TO GET LEAKER. WHEN GETTING THERE, RESPONDER NOTICED IT WAS A HAZMAT GRABBED LEAKER AND CLEANED UP SPILL OFF TRAILER GROUND. TOOK BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS LEAKER.
